title: Leah Remini Finds Out Husband Is Cheating on ‘Ellen’ Show?
subtitle: Did Leah Remini discover during a taping of Ellen DeGeneres' show that her spouse was being unfaithful to her?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Leah Remini found out during a phone prank Ellen DeGeneres' show that her husband was cheating on her.
